idea:
Launched in 2018, InCHES Academy is a career education and development institute promoted by doctors with decades of experience in teaching medical students, medical practitioners, non- medicos working in healthcare industry, insurance professionals and government officials (of various State Health Authorities).

Our content is backed by over 500 years of collective, time tested and proven clinical cum teaching expertise having conducted over 1000 trainings. With deep insights into physician attitudes and successful experience of designing target specific training programs, InCHES Academy is undoubtedly the ideal source to disseminate this information. Striving for excellence and empowerment InCHES Academy has set its sight on becoming a Center of Excellence taking medical and quasi medical training for health force and insurance companies alike.
name: INCHES CONTINUING SKILL DEVELOPMENT LLP

idea:
Allern is a technology based e learning service which is attempting to create a world class user experience for curriculum based audio visual content as well as concept based audio visual content.

The idea is to make the offering extremely cheap and accessible to students/learners through strategic partnerships for market coverage and strategic financing and internal resource allocation.

This initiative creates vocation for existing teachers/faculty/academicians over and above their regular jobs and allows them to get love and feedback of potentially large number of students. This continuous feedback will be captured into the technology that runs the platform to only improve our world of education.

Allern will continue to explore various educational curriculum which it can assist and supplement from a technology standpoint.

Further, Allern wants to invest it's resources into research in fields such as artificial intelligence/biometrics and other related scientific matters and apply it's learnings into technology and a robust business plan that creates value for all stakeholders including the students and the faculty.
name: ALLERN ENTERPRISES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Nixsoft offer a wide variety of software services in an onsite/offshore environment. Our

extensive experience in managing resources, process and adherence to quality, help our

clients focus on core business strategies while reducing operating costs.

Nixsoft Technologies Private Limited delivers cutting edge solutions, which helps the

Enterprises to reduce costs, improve the process and optimize the business growth, thereby

delivering Value to the Organization. Our expertise and several man-years of experience in

the technologies have ensured that we have always had access to the most in-depth

technical and business knowledge.
name: P. S. NIXSOFT TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Far Left Retail Private Limited carries on the business of online shopping, online store, net marketing of

consumer and other goods, shops, digital pop up shops, creating shopping

catalogues, providing secured payment processing, net commerce solutions for

business to business and business to consumers, online trading in and outside

India but does not include banking and money circulating business. 

It offers one stop solution of curated and unique products across most categories, 

and the like of gifts, lifestyle products, fashion accessories, food and beauty,

perennial party supplies, props for home, workplace, bar and parties etc.

It establishes, manages, supervises, collaborates and controls manufacturing chains

and online marketing services with a view to encourage people to effect savings

and accommodating the products and services promoted by the company along

with focus on design, uniqueness and quality.
name: Far Left Retail Private Limited

idea: Daten and Wissen Technology is AI-based company, dealing in various types of projects in AI domain. Our specialities include working in Machine Learning, Data Science, NLP, Computer Vision, Predictive Analysis, Deep Learning, Chatbot Development among others. We are working in AI for various sectors like Healthcare, Education, Fragrance Industry, Sports ,etc.
name: DATEN AND WISSEN PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Eredita Media Tech Private Limited is a Private incorporated on 15 March 2019. It is classified as Non-govt company and is registered at Registrar of Companies, Mumbai. It is inolved in Business activities in Digital Marketing.
name: Eredita Media Tech Pvt Ltd

idea:
Mool is India’s first AI-powered tax optimisation and Income personalisation tool. We are building intelligent solutions to simplify finances for all at Mool Innovation Labs.


Currently, we have built Mool Vetan, India’s first pay-structure automation tool that offers salary optimisation, personalisation and customisation for employees. It employs a set of intelligent rules to maximise the employee’s benefits from their salary package while remaining compliant with the framework of Income Tax and Labour laws. The algorithm creates customised salary structures tailored to the individual profiles of employees.
name: MOOL INNOVATION LABS PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ZEROTRASH INNOVATIONS LLP is a social business focusing on solid waste management related issues and providing solutions to the commercial and residential institutions of the society.  We offer a range of services and products to ensure the safe and proper disposal of solid waste.  

We offer Biogas and composting services for organic waste and dry waste we channelize for recycling with Pollution Control Board registered recyclers. We also engage Waste Pickers and Small Scrap Dealers to make them economically empowered. We have proudly collected and disposed of more than 5000 MT of Plastic from across the country.
name: ZEROTRASH INNOVATIONS LLP
